bannedIngredients.name: High Fructose Corn Syrup (HFCS)

bannedIngredients.reason: Hard on the body’s metabolic system, linked to increased caloric intake

bannedIngredients.name: Sodium Nitrite
bannedIngredients.reason: Found in processed meats, linked to colon cancer, heart disease, and obesity

bannedIngredients.name: Sodium Nitrate
bannedIngredients.reason: Found in processed meats, linked to colon cancer, heart disease, and obesity

bannedIngredients.name: MSG (Monosodium Glutamate)
bannedIngredients.reason: Enhances flavor but can be harmful to brain function, linked to high sodium levels

bannedIngredients.reason: Contains high levels of omega-6 fatty acids, which can contribute to inflammation when consumed in excess

bannedIngredients.name: Hemp Seed Oil
